name: Chingri Machher Malaikari
steps: Shell and wash the prawns, marinate with salt and turmeric powder and keep aside.
Heat oil in a frying pan and light fry the prawns and keep aside.
In the remaining oil add the onion paste and stir fry for 5 minutes.
Add ginger and garlic paste, cumin powder, turmeric powder, red chillie powder and kasshmiri red chillie powder and stir fry for 5minutes approximately till the oil seperates from the mixture.
Add 2 cups of water, sugar and salt and cook for 3 minutes.
Add the fried prawns and cook for 2 minutes.
Add coconut milk and green chillies.
Cover the pan with lid and simmer for 10 minutes stirring in between to ensure the mixture does not get stuck to the bottom of the frying pan.
Add the garam masala and ghee and stir continuously till the mixture acquires the right consistency
